name: Square Waves
description:
A little game prototype where you strategically place squares to maximize the amount of waves the squares cause, and thus, your income of squares.

HOW TO PLAY:

Squares send a "pulse" to squares placed to the immediate right and top of their position. Using this game mechanic, you can maximize the amount of squares you gain by placing squares dedicated to causing the waves in a bigger body of squares packed together.

NOTE: THIS GAME DOES NOT HAVE A SAVE FUNCTION AT THE MOMENT
